How are my logins and passwords securely stored in your application?
Can I trust the security of locally stored passwords in your application?
What happens if I forget the password for the application? Is there a way to recover it?
Can anyone other than me access my logins and passwords?
Your data is stored exclusively on your device, and we do not collect it for transmission to third parties.
Absolutely, as we use modern end-to-end encryption. Moreover, a unique key is created for each device, preventing mass hacking attempts.
If you forget the application password, you will need to enter the Secret Word to recover the data. You can always check and change it in the settings by finding the best combination. However, if you forget both your PIN and Secret Word, you won\'t be able to regain access to your account.
No, as we never request or collect your data without your consent.
